thread.title: Sarfraz Ahmed named Pakistan’s ODI captain

title: Sarfraz Ahmed named Pakistan’s ODI captain
text:
Sarfraz Ahmed named Pakistan’s ODI captain | 0 0 
LAHORE: Sarfraz Ahmed has been appointed the captain of Pakistan ODI team, PCB chairman Shahryar Khan announced on Thursday. 
Sarfraz has replaced Azhar Ali as the captain of the ODI format. Azhar held a meeting with Shahryar Khan to inform of his decision to step down from the captaincy, the PCB chairman said. 
Wicketkeeper-batsman Sarfraz is already the national team’s T20I captain. 0 0 Sarfraz Ahmed named Pakistan’s ODI captain was posted in sports of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 09, 2017 and was last updated on February 09, 2017. This news story is related to Sport, Sport News, Geo News, Latest Sport News, Cricket, Sarfraz Ahmed, Pakistan Captain, Odi Captain.
